column3: Includes excise, value-added and similar taxes.$8,186 $8,492 $8,010

Other than the United States, Australia and Nigeria, no other country accounted for 10 percent or more of the company’s net properties, plant and equipment (PP&E) in 2014. Australia had $41,012, $31,464 and $21,770 in 2014, 2013, and 2012, respectively. Nigeria had PP&E of $19,214, $18,429 and $17,485 for 2014, 2013 and 2012, respectively.
Depreciation expense includes accretion expense of $882, $627 and $629 in 2014, 2013 and 2012, respectively.
There was no effect of dividend equivalents paid on stock units or dilutive impact of employee stock-based awards on earnings.
